::Zardus/FZ::

"None as of yet," Zardus replies. "I'll keep in mind the possible hostilities between them and the Predacons when making a deal, though," Zardus replies.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ, along with Zardus, since their comms were on the same frequency, recieves Halucigen's, DevilDuer's, and Wheeljack's messages. He makes sure that the room to the lab was locked, then walking off toward the exit of the Iron Fist.

"There are old pods in the lower levels of the base, Wheeljack," he replies to Wheeljack, "See if you can modify any of them. If not, we'll find a Maximal one."

He exits the base, sending a transmission to Halucigen: "Welcome, Halucigen. I'll lower a portion of the shield so you can enter. I'm near the base's entrance, meet me there."

He taps a few buttons on his wrist comp, a piece of the shield in front of Halucigen dropping so that the Destron could enter.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Abyssian Badass" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra::
> 
> "Alright.  On what terms are you with the Infecticons?  I believe that the
> Infecticons may be enemies of Darkfate's..." Orchestra aked.
